channel.title: 3D Vision on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Vision on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CAT3D: Create Anything in 3D with Multi-View Diffusion Models
item.description: CAT3D: Generate high-quality 3D scenes from as little as one image using a novel multi-view diffusion model, outperforming existing methods in speed and quality.

item.title: GIC: Gaussian-Informed Continuum for Physical Property Identification and Simulation
item.description: GIC: Novel hybrid framework leverages 3D Gaussian representation for accurate physical property estimation from visual observations, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: MeshFormer : High-Quality Mesh Generation with 3D-Guided Reconstruction Model
item.description: MeshFormer: High-quality 3D mesh generation from sparse views in seconds, using transformers and 3D convolutions.
